A Ruby library for converting arbitrary shell output (with ANSI) into beautifully rendered HTML.

[90m$[0m curl -o /tmp/file.txt https://example.com/file.txt
  % Total    % Received % Xferd  Average Speed   Time    Time     Time  Current

100   360  100   360    0     0    170      0  0:00:02  0:00:02 --:--:--   170
